attributes.action: protect whistle blowers jobs and make sacking for this illegal as they are serving public interest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
protect whistle blowers jobs and make sacking for this illegal as they are serving public interest.

Why should anyone be sacked for revealing information to the public domain and exposing incompetence and immorality. There has been a few cases in recent months such as the nurse sacked for exposing poor standards in the NHS and the most publicised being the leak what led to the rest of Damien Green. Whistle blowers do a grave justice in this country and should be encouraged to speak out. Gordon Brown was renowned for whistle blowing himself whilst in opposition.
